text: No Time to Die is a 2021 spy movie. It is twenty-fifth movie in the James Bond series. It is produced by Eon Productions for Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and Universal Pictures. The movie has Daniel Craig in his fifth and final performance as fictional MI6 agent, James Bond. It is directed by Cary Joji Fukunaga. == Cast == * Daniel Craig as James Bond * LÃ©a Seydoux as Dr. Madeleine Swann == Theme Song == Billie Eilish performed and released the official theme of the movie in February 2020. The movie released on 3 April 2021 in the United Kingdom and on 8 October 2021 worldwide. ==References== Category:2021 movies Category:2020s epic movies Category:2020s spy movies Category:James Bond movies Category:British spy movies Category:American spy movies Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer Category:Movies directed by Cary Joji Fukunaga Category:Movies about terrorism Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in Norway Category:Movies set in Jamaica
title: No Time to Die
